Melody.Register/Tessitura: The comfortable range of a singer or instrument, where the sound is most pleasant and clear.
Melody.Sequence: A musical idea that is reapeted at different pithces
Melody.Scalic: A melody that moves in moves a stepwise manner, typically up or down the scale
Melody.Broken Chord: A chord that is played one note at a time, rather than all at once
Melody.Conjunct: A melody that moves by small intervals, typically steps or seconds
Melody.Disjunct: A melody that moves by larger intervals, typically leaps
